trans-unit.source: Provides type conversion analogous behavior for <xref href="System.Windows.Setter"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Trigger"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Condition"></xref> types that deal with <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 형식 변환에 대 한 유사한 동작을 제공 <xref href="System.Windows.Setter"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Trigger"> </xref> 및 <xref href="System.Windows.Condition"> </xref> 를 처리 하는 형식 <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: This converter only supports <xref uid="langword_csharp_ConvertFrom" name="ConvertFrom" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 변환기만 지원 <xref uid="langword_csharp_ConvertFrom" name="ConvertFrom" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: SetterTriggerConditionValueConverter is not intended for use by user code, it supports WPF feature areas such as processing <xref:System.Windows.Setter>, <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> and <xref:System.Windows.Condition> in templates.
trans-unit.target: SetterTriggerConditionValueConverter 없습니다 사용 하기 위해 사용자 코드에 의해 처리 같은 WPF 기능 영역 지원 <xref:System.Windows.Setter>, <xref:System.Windows.Trigger>및 <xref:System.Windows.Condition>템플릿에서.</xref:System.Windows.Condition> </xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.Setter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.SetterTriggerConditionValueConverter"></xref> class.

Returns a value that indicates whether the converter can convert from a source object to a side-effect-produced <xref href="System.Windows.Setter"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Trigger"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Condition"></xref> .
trans-unit.target: 변환기는 측면에서 효과-만든를 원본 개체에서 변환할 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 반환 <xref href="System.Windows.Setter"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Trigger"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Windows.Condition"> </xref> 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation only returns `true` for `sourceType` of <xref:System.String> or a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현은 반환 `true` 에 대 한 `sourceType` 의 <xref:System.String>또는 바이트 배열입니다.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
The type to convert from.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>변환기에서 변환을; 수행할 수 있는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the converter can convert to the specified destination type.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 대상 형식 변환기 변환할 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
The type to convert to.
Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Converts the converted source value if an underlying type converter can be obtained from context.
trans-unit.target: 기본 형식 변환기 컨텍스트를 가져올 수 있으면 변환된 된 소스 값으로 변환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise returns an unconverted source.
trans-unit.target: 그렇지 않으면 변환 되지 않은 소스를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to use as the current culture.
The object to convert.
The converter object, or possibly an unconverted source.
trans-unit.target: 변환기 개체 이거나 변환 되지 않은 소스입니다.

trans-unit.source: context or source is .
No <xref href="System.Xaml.IXamlSchemaContextProvider"></xref> service available.
Converts the specified object to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 형식으로 지정된 된 개체를 변환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Always throws an exception.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to use as the current culture.
The object to convert.
The type to convert to.
Always throws an exception.
Thrown in all cases.
